channel.title: lowercase sounds... podcast
channel.description: mostly house music, but sometimes ambient, hip hop, and downtempo
channel.itunes:subtitle: good music from good people!!!
channel.itunes:author: tres(lowercase sounds...)
channel.itunes:summary: mostly house music, but sometimes ambient, hip hop, and downtempo

item.title: drifting 010 with tres johnson(lowercase sounds) 04.15.12
item.description: hello friends! here we are at episode 10 of drifting. i am obviously going to stick with the title drifting for a little while. i think it fits almost better than the title "on a path" did. it has been a busy few weeks for me, so i have been falling behind on posting again. even missed playing a set last week(05.06.12), as i had a party saturday night that left me tired and unwilling to set up my gear. the next set i post will be the one i did this week. which is my post bigomaha set. so lets get to this one shall we?!?! i have very little recollection about this set. so i don't know what to say about it. i do know it is super deep, and i did do a track list... one issue with the track list though is that i probably spelled some titles or some artists names wrong, so use some searching skills if you want the tune and you will be able to find on any of the digital download sites(legal [please). i guess that is about it.. thanks as always for again taking the time out of your day to download, stream, and listen! glasgow - moodymanc - elef remix strange love - pillow talk - john tejada mix blindfolded marvin zeyss all good - inland knights electronic streets - added one more night -ross couch all the way - beesmont sound system pilot - halo mix do that thang - bon the way - dj wild women kiss - chris prod - r cooper remix rotblau - floska spit take - elon sundown - grant nelson up north - elon breaking down - inland knights bring all down - ernesto deep wanderer - romathony we move - freaks circle of life - ross couch right now - freddie parrisi pilot - phil asher aki bergman
item.dc:creator: tres(lowercase sounds...)
item.itunes:summary:
hello friends! here we are at episode 10 of drifting. i am obviously going to stick with the title drifting for a little while. i think it fits almost better than the title "on a path" did.
it has been a busy few weeks for me, so i have been falling behind on posting again. even missed playing a set last week(05.06.12), as i had a party saturday night that left me tired and unwilling to set up my gear. the next set i post will be the one i did this week. which is my post bigomaha set.
so lets get to this one shall we?!?! i have very little recollection about this set. so i don't know what to say about it. i do know it is super deep, and i did do a track list... one issue with the track list though is that i probably spelled some titles or some artists names wrong, so use some searching skills if you want the tune and you will be able to find on any of the digital download sites(legal [please). i guess that is about it.. thanks as always for again taking the time out of your day to download, stream, and listen!
glasgow - moodymanc - elef remix strange love - pillow talk - john tejada mix blindfolded marvin zeyss all good - inland knights electronic streets - added one more night -ross couch all the way - beesmont sound system pilot - halo mix do that thang - bon the way - dj wild women kiss - chris prod - r cooper remix rotblau - floska spit take - elon sundown - grant nelson up north - elon breaking down - inland knights bring all down - ernesto deep wanderer - romathony we move - freaks circle of life - ross couch right now - freddie parrisi pilot - phil asher aki bergman

item.title: drifting 009 with tres johnson(lowercase sounds) 04.08.12
item.description: i am listening to this set now, as i post this, and digging it.. it clocked in at just under 2 hours. it was the first set i did that was deep house post trip to san francisco, as the week before i did a disco edits show that i posted for download over at http://soundcloud.com/tres-1/disco-drifting-with-tres there was some sloppiness to the mixing. which is why it is posted over there instead of here. make sure if you haven't yet that you go subscribe to my blog at http://lowercasetres.com i have been posting photos of the street art i came across in san francisco, and trying to find out more about the artists.. i share with you some videos i come across on the web, as well as the photos i took. track listing might be a little off, as i was a little drunk. thanks as always for taking your time to listen! i love you! something i love - herck another day - adapter trabajo - herck aitor rona - dj deep fucking beat the node - hernen cerbello lokal -swayzak the protocol - hernen cerbello i love soul - alex sosa robins tax - js production slow motion - ben sims atlantida - jackspot are you safe - brandcash bassassisin - jackspot street talk - chris carrier kinda umm - tom budden 3rd face - canto dc madiba - tapesh miss wonderful - caie john langhorn terrestre - the sun warrios try it again - pezzner the message - johnny fiasco
item.dc:creator: tres(lowercase sounds...)
item.itunes:summary:
i am listening to this set now, as i post this, and digging it.. it clocked in at just under 2 hours. it was the first set i did that was deep house post trip to san francisco, as the week before i did a disco edits show that i posted for download over at http://soundcloud.com/tres-1/disco-drifting-with-tres there was some sloppiness to the mixing. which is why it is posted over there instead of here.

track listing might be a little off, as i was a little drunk. thanks as always for taking your time to listen! i love you!

item.title: drifting 008 with tres johnson(lowercase sounds)03.18.12
item.description: hello! hope you all are doing well! i am still riding the wave of creative energy that i got while visiting san francisco! check out my blog over at http://lowercasetres.com to see the slide show of the trip. i was really going to try to get this tracklisted for you, but i am to busy making art, and taking care of some other biz... so if there is a tune you need to know what it is hit me with a time, and i can try to figure it out. i did listen to the set on the way to san francisco and absolutely loved it! it is 3 hours long too. thanks as always for taking the time out of your day to listen to me mix... :)
item.dc:creator: tres(lowercase sounds...)
item.itunes:summary:
hello! hope you all are doing well! i am still riding the wave of creative energy that i got while visiting san francisco! check out my blog over at http://lowercasetres.com to see the slide show of the trip.
i was really going to try to get this tracklisted for you, but i am to busy making art, and taking care of some other biz... so if there is a tune you need to know what it is hit me with a time, and i can try to figure it out.
i did listen to the set on the way to san francisco and absolutely loved it! it is 3 hours long too.
thanks as always for taking the time out of your day to listen to me mix... :)

item.title: drifting 007 with tres johnson(lowercase sounds) 03.04.12
item.description: ok... so my intentions were to get this track listed on my way to san francisco. i used torq, and it should of been easy enough to make it happen... however, i got into torq and there were about 3 times more tunes in the playlist than made it into the set. i gave up... while in san francisco i was having so much fun not being wrapped up in my online world. sure i was out there taking photos all along and getting them posted to various sites using instagram(check out my flickr: http://www.flickr.com/photos/lowercasesounds/). i am going to keep this post short and let the music speak for me. i am behind in getting sets up, as i usually am. so lets get this out there, so i can get caught up next week. check out my site: http://lowercasesounds.com every night of the week for great djs from around the planet doing their thing! i am live most sundays at 6pm cst. if you want me to come to your town to dj, let me know.. lets get it sorted!
item.dc:creator: tres(lowercase sounds...)
item.itunes:summary:
ok... so my intentions were to get this track listed on my way to san francisco. i used torq, and it should of been easy enough to make it happen... however, i got into torq and there were about 3 times more tunes in the playlist than made it into the set. i gave up... while in san francisco i was having so much fun not being wrapped up in my online world. sure i was out there taking photos all along and getting them posted to various sites using instagram(check out my flickr: http://www.flickr.com/photos/lowercasesounds/).
i am going to keep this post short and let the music speak for me. i am behind in getting sets up, as i usually am. so lets get this out there, so i can get caught up next week.
check out my site: http://lowercasesounds.com every night of the week for great djs from around the planet doing their thing! i am live most sundays at 6pm cst.
if you want me to come to your town to dj, let me know.. lets get it sorted!

item.title: drifting 006 with tres johnson(lowercase sounds)02.26.12
item.description: alright i was thinking of some things to write about this weeks podcast... but i was wasted the nigh*t of this, and honestly have very little recollection of the night. i do remember that there were a few new peeps in the chat, and it was an extra long set. i used torq again, so this tracklist might be over complete... meaning i put down everything that was on the playlist, that doesnt mean the tune was actually played though... i think most of them are there. lol i hope that you all have a great week! i have this weeks broadcast ready to go too. if downloads on this one slow down by thursday i will get another cast up before i leave for denver friday morning... oh did i forget to mention that i am djing friday night at this: http://www.facebook.com/events/317598348257568/ and then saturday night at this: http://www.facebook.com/events/368776953141844/ both parties will be epic! dont forget to check out http://lowercasesounds.com for more great djs from around the planet! fusique - solaris heights back in the day - tony antonio let me go - deepsoul klauss - londonground dakota - londonground take my freedom - francesco grant floating soul - marcelo nassi - chris minus fur die liebe - matthew decay & lee burridge who matters - beradino & sonatore please me - marcus sur floating soul - marcelo nassi special days - bernadion & sonatore music understanding - lives & migova grands boulevards - lives & migova even move - bolumar took me up - marvel house purple pills - london fm & irregular synth dont scream - francesco grant new jumper - scott edwards mercy theme - cubiq power to the people - wasabi funk & soul - rafa barrios velvet - wrighty just do it - wrighty 8 hours - juann ddd & johan dresser nata 430 - ales denne kamba dance - joeski -le vinyl the goddess - marvel house please me - marcus sur kinda girl - marvel house power to the people - wasabi beautiful nightmare - alex denne tambourine - rafa barrios xylo calling - christian zanzu new york - christian zanzu disco king - max freegrant its groovy baby - max freegrant fever - j phlip

item.title: drifting 005 with tres johnson(lowercase sounds) 02.19.12
item.description: hello! hope you are all well... sorry missed a few weeks posting sets. stay tuned with me on http://Facebook.com/lowercasetres this set i stayed in the 100-110 bpm range, and loved it. i was using torq 2.0 so i was able to search for just tunes in this bpm range. was kind of cool.. the set ended up being great, and the chatroom was having a good time that night! i hope you enjoy this! tracklisting: like a star - sello humid - ilo room 208 - fsol son of a don - sello its like -anton zap lose myself - manolo transition - sound like hugo never give up - robert owens sunshines theme - dubtribe blumenwiese neben Autobahn - Ulrich schnauss one ten - shur-I-kan reach me - crazy p return of starlight - woolfy vs projections geisha - tommy nash & christian slater rise of equality - w&p hgg & dubbyman lose yourself - fritz zander conoid tone - higher intelligence agency ville des folies - davide dallamo purple sun - honom get my lovin - frank solano haha - maurice joshua devotion - tres johnson & remedy heaven - kasper bjoerke deep slow - latenta project get my lovin - organized crime icicle -raw sugar soul power - marshmallows man of wisdom -sect around - noir and haze recorded in the garage - mic newman days on south - savvas stop space return - crazy p whats now - cross groove europa - axel boman sunshines theme - dubtribe
item.dc:creator: tres(lowercase sounds...)
item.itunes:summary:
hello! hope you are all well... sorry missed a few weeks posting sets. stay tuned with me on http://Facebook.com/lowercasetres
this set i stayed in the 100-110 bpm range, and loved it. i was using torq 2.0 so i was able to search for just tunes in this bpm range. was kind of cool.. the set ended up being great, and the chatroom was having a good time that night!
i hope you enjoy this!
tracklisting:
like a star - sello humid - ilo room 208 - fsol son of a don - sello its like -anton zap lose myself - manolo transition - sound like hugo never give up - robert owens sunshines theme - dubtribe blumenwiese neben Autobahn - Ulrich schnauss one ten - shur-I-kan reach me - crazy p return of starlight - woolfy vs projections geisha - tommy nash & christian slater rise of equality - w&p hgg & dubbyman lose yourself - fritz zander conoid tone - higher intelligence agency ville des folies - davide dallamo purple sun - honom get my lovin - frank solano haha - maurice joshua devotion - tres johnson & remedy heaven - kasper bjoerke deep slow - latenta project get my lovin - organized crime icicle -raw sugar soul power - marshmallows man of wisdom -sect around - noir and haze recorded in the garage - mic newman days on south - savvas stop space return - crazy p whats now - cross groove europa - axel boman sunshines theme - dubtribe

item.title: drifting 004 with tres johnson(lowercase sounds)01.29.12
item.description: hello friends! hope this finds you well this week! been a few weeks since i posted a set. for that i apologize... i just wasnt feeling them as much as i would like to... that brings us to this set... started out with some chill and ambientish stuff, and then worked into some deep house... at the very beginning of the set is some mic noise that gets sorted out within a few seconds... i was going to try to edit that out, but realized that i would have to turn the mp3 into a wav, and then back into mp3... all good, except that the sound would keep degrading... so in interest of not losing the sound quality we get to deal with that noise. :) this weeks set i tried out the torq 2.0 for djing with, i used cd decks with the control cds to mix and all that jazz, but wanted to try out the software... overall i liked it, but it annoys me to no end to stare at a computer screen while i am mixing... i will probably use it again, as it runs real smooth on my new macbook pro. was thinking that i need to get some small controller action going so i can do ambient mixes from the couch. we will see if i sort that out in the future! also with using torq i was hoping that i could easily do my track list, but torq saves tunes that i even just previewed as part of the track listing, so i have no recollection what i actually played... will try to get back on board of the track listings this week. i guess that is about it for this time around. hope that you have a wonderful week! check lowercasesounds.com periodically through the week to see who is playing live, and stop by on a sunday night at 6pm cst to catch my show live. here is the video from this broadcast: http://bambuser.com/channel/lowercasesounds/broadcast/2325869
item.dc:creator: tres(lowercase sounds...)
item.itunes:summary:
hello friends! hope this finds you well this week! been a few weeks since i posted a set. for that i apologize... i just wasnt feeling them as much as i would like to...
that brings us to this set... started out with some chill and ambientish stuff, and then worked into some deep house... at the very beginning of the set is some mic noise that gets sorted out within a few seconds... i was going to try to edit that out, but realized that i would have to turn the mp3 into a wav, and then back into mp3... all good, except that the sound would keep degrading... so in interest of not losing the sound quality we get to deal with that noise. :)
this weeks set i tried out the torq 2.0 for djing with, i used cd decks with the control cds to mix and all that jazz, but wanted to try out the software... overall i liked it, but it annoys me to no end to stare at a computer screen while i am mixing... i will probably use it again, as it runs real smooth on my new macbook pro. was thinking that i need to get some small controller action going so i can do ambient mixes from the couch. we will see if i sort that out in the future!
also with using torq i was hoping that i could easily do my track list, but torq saves tunes that i even just previewed as part of the track listing, so i have no recollection what i actually played...
will try to get back on board of the track listings this week.
i guess that is about it for this time around. hope that you have a wonderful week! check lowercasesounds.com periodically through the week to see who is playing live, and stop by on a sunday night at 6pm cst to catch my show live.
here is the video from this broadcast: http://bambuser.com/channel/lowercasesounds/broadcast/2325869

item.title: drifting 003 with tres johnson(lowercase sounds)01.01.12
item.description: ok so here is drifting 003, i came home after a really hard nye/nyd of working... but i felt like i still needed to play some tunes. i lowered my stand that my gear is on to halfway sit. i also included an old kaoss pad that i hadn't used in quite awhile. i think i was able to add to the set without getting carried away with effects.. i need to work with it more again and remember what each effect is and how it works... since i am playing music that isn't like house mixing, it is nice to add some embellishments... something else to know is that i feel like drifting is taking the place of "on a path" for the time being. i will still play deep house and work some into these sets here and there, but i am really feeling the direction i have been going. i hope you are too! some of these tunes are from the era i was going to raves and such, when i listen now as older, it really takes me back to those wonderful moments hearing loud music in warehouse settings... thanks as always for taking the time to download, and listen. :) track listing: man ray desert love song - tres johnson 9.25 - global communications the lost day - eno dead skin cells - fsol open the light - boards of canada what do you go home to - explosions in the sky sofa surfers - sofa surfers rites of passage - future primitive sudden intake - the black dog asleep from day - chemical brothers that finger on your temple is the barrel of my raygun - stars of the lid word problems - harmonic 313 vit - fsol song of life - leftfield praying mantra - material - orb remix darkness - future primitive ventolin - aphex twin plum island - orb
item.dc:creator: tres(lowercase sounds...)
item.itunes:summary:
ok so here is drifting 003, i came home after a really hard nye/nyd of working... but i felt like i still needed to play some tunes. i lowered my stand that my gear is on to halfway sit. i also included an old kaoss pad that i hadn't used in quite awhile. i think i was able to add to the set without getting carried away with effects.. i need to work with it more again and remember what each effect is and how it works... since i am playing music that isn't like house mixing, it is nice to add some embellishments... something else to know is that i feel like drifting is taking the place of "on a path" for the time being. i will still play deep house and work some into these sets here and there, but i am really feeling the direction i have been going. i hope you are too! some of these tunes are from the era i was going to raves and such, when i listen now as older, it really takes me back to those wonderful moments hearing loud music in warehouse settings... thanks as always for taking the time to download, and listen. :)
track listing: man ray desert love song - tres johnson 9.25 - global communications the lost day - eno dead skin cells - fsol open the light - boards of canada what do you go home to - explosions in the sky sofa surfers - sofa surfers rites of passage - future primitive sudden intake - the black dog asleep from day - chemical brothers that finger on your temple is the barrel of my raygun - stars of the lid word problems - harmonic 313 vit - fsol song of life - leftfield praying mantra - material - orb remix darkness - future primitive ventolin - aphex twin plum island - orb

item.title: drifting 002 with tres johnson(lowercase sounds)12.25.11
item.description: hope you all are having a great holiday season! since christmas fell on sunday this year, i decided to do a special ambient broadcast that night. i figured most people were going to need a chiller vibe after dealing with family all day. the chatroom was alive with some familiar chatters, and i think we even picked up a few new peeps. i was going to go longer on this set, but for some reason i was getting a tune ready and the cd deck struggled with it, and i ended up with dead air, so instead of going on i just ended with the last tune before the silence. maybe for drifting #003 i will start where i left off. i hope you all dont mind this shift into ambient music that i have been doing. i am not tired of deep house, just been needing to explore other avenues of music... speak up and let me know your feelings! have a happy new year! track listing: stars - brian eno motoc - loscil untitled #5- sigur ros cielo - murcof exposure - fripp warmed by the drift - biosphere the dream - orb zephr - loscil 14.31 - global communications cometa - murcof we were once - jessica bailiff steam - loscil slider - fsol rites of passage - future primitive the time has come - unkle sparrow - mira calix the beast - palmskin productions stormy cloud - krush deep blaque- dr who dat
item.dc:creator: tres(lowercase sounds...)
item.itunes:summary:
hope you all are having a great holiday season! since christmas fell on sunday this year, i decided to do a special ambient broadcast that night. i figured most people were going to need a chiller vibe after dealing with family all day. the chatroom was alive with some familiar chatters, and i think we even picked up a few new peeps. i was going to go longer on this set, but for some reason i was getting a tune ready and the cd deck struggled with it, and i ended up with dead air, so instead of going on i just ended with the last tune before the silence. maybe for drifting #003 i will start where i left off.
i hope you all dont mind this shift into ambient music that i have been doing. i am not tired of deep house, just been needing to explore other avenues of music... speak up and let me know your feelings!
have a happy new year!
track listing: stars - brian eno motoc - loscil untitled #5- sigur ros cielo - murcof exposure - fripp warmed by the drift - biosphere the dream - orb zephr - loscil 14.31 - global communications cometa - murcof we were once - jessica bailiff steam - loscil slider - fsol rites of passage - future primitive the time has come - unkle sparrow - mira calix the beast - palmskin productions stormy cloud - krush deep blaque- dr who dat
